author: cms-sw
body:
- FORCE_ENABLED=ON : So that xrootd fails is any required deps is not found
- ENABLE_VOMS=FALSE : Do build voms
- ENABLE_HTTP=TRUE: Explicitly enabled http and include curl deps for this
- XRDCL_ONLY : Build clinet only part of xrootd
title: [xrootd] Use FORCE_ENABLED to make sure xrootd fails if any deps is not found
